segments.text: I can't believe how messy this kitchen is getting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman is just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to notice, it's so gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing on stools to get cookies, making a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this much disorder and lack of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman realizes what's happening soon and cleans up this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause damage if it keeps spilling like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't stand seeing such a messy and chaotic scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
